ui.err_boot: Initialisation failed. Check connections and public endpoints.
narrative.block0:
Context, sample and active filters. This report profiles municipal-waste circularity in the EU27 for base year {year}, with {subset_n} countries in the current subset. Filters: operation {op_human}; metric shown {show_human}; aggregation {agg_label}; countries {subset_n} ({geos_compact}).
See full country list{geos_full}
Shares (RCY, BIO, INC, LND) are percentages of each country’s annual total; results are presented as {agg_label} mean ({kMean}%), median ({kMed}%) and full distribution.{endNote}
narrative.block1: 1) Average level and within-group spread. The average recycling (RCY) was {kMean}% with median {kMed}%. The Top-3 reaches {top3}% on average, while the Bottom-3 does not exceed {bot3}%.
narrative.block2: 2) Country ranking. In {year}, the top performer was {best_code} ({best_val}%) and the last was {worst_code} ({worst_val}%).
narrative.block3: 3) Composition of the “median country”. The median country {med_code} shows: RCY {med_rcy}%, BIO {med_bio}%, INC {med_inc}%, LND {med_lnd}%, Others {med_outros}%.
narrative.block4: 4) Time trajectories. The average rate (OLS) for {op_label} is {slope_ppya} pp/year.
narrative.block5: 5) End-of-line (LND+INC). The subset mean is {end_mean}%. Against the ≤10% landfill target, the average landfill gap is {gap_aterro_pp} pp.
narrative.block6: 6) Structural trade-off. RCY vs. LND+INC shows the expected negative relation.
narrative.block7: 7) Statistical distribution. min {box_min}%, Q1 {box_q1}%, median {box_med}%, Q3 {box_q3}%, max {box_max}%.
narrative.block8: 8) Associations between operations. Strongest association: {corr_pair}, ρ={corr_val}%.
narrative.endNote_tpl: Whenever LND+INC is not available in the selected year, a time-series fallback is used; in this subset it required using year <mark>{year}</mark> to complete the indicator
